name: Farm Defender (wanxueheng, owenchen)
description:
This is a 3D game implemented based on the ideas from 2D PvZ. This is also a student project of INFO 551 at University of Arizona by Xueheng Wan and Yawen Chen.

CONTROLS W A S DMoveRReset Point of ViewMouseTarget Objects (Pot & Sun Collection)Number 1-7Pick Plants NOTE
  • We highly recommend you watch the tutorial first.
  • Encounter any bugs ? Feel free to comments!
  • Other than those notes, enjoy playing.
